document_data.name: [[Axehand]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''Axehand''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]].

The family remained steadfastly loyal to [[Azoun]] during the [[Abraxus_affair|Abraxus Affair]] in [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Living members: * Lord [[Beldamyr Axehand]] is loyal to King [[Azoun]] but not [[Tanalasta]]
